general_info.summary: This document outlines various academic programs and administrative services offered by Sharda University, including details on its schools of study, examination reports, student support services like career counseling and scholarships, and important university information such as its history, leadership, and statutory bodies. It also highlights initiatives related to innovation, entrepreneurship, skill development, and specific services like FM radio, visa guidelines, and mentoring portals.
